transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello, hi sir. Main abhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Ji. Sir, A.K. Industries ke liye maine call kiya tha aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main abhi baat kar rahi hu sir aap se. To sir services ke liye hi maine aapko main connect kiya hai abhi. Service abhi sir aapne feedback share kiya tha. To buyleads ke liye hi aapne kuch concern raise kiye hain ki relevancy nahi hai buyleads mein.
Hmm.
Customer: Okay. To kahan pe problem aa rahi hai sir? Agar aap thoda sa detail mein bataye to main aapki isme thodi help kar sakti hu. Issues kahan pe aa rahe hain sir abhi buyleads mein?
Customer: Nahi, ye sab cheeze already ho chuki hai madam. Kya hota hai aapke yahan pe na proper ye cheeze nahi hai. Matlab koi inquiry kar raha hai, hum usko lead le rahe hain. Aapne hume limit diya hai. But customer bolta hai ki hamara hi material hume sell karna hai. Koi koi bolta hai wrong number, koi bolta hai isme harassment ho raha hai. Already itna payment pay karne ke baad bhi aapka service nahi hai na proper. Usme kya hai workout kya hai aapka? Verify supplier nahi koi bhi aake uspe inquiry generate karta hai ya kya jo bhi catalog pe view karte hi immediately uska inquiry aa jata hai.
Executive: Sir, aapka point main samajh gayi hu.
Customer: Matlab nine months and all tak hai na itne din ke baad na aur aapka har mahine mein na do teen aapne jo target diya rehta hai na aapke executive rahenge ya manager jo bhi hai aapke account se to woh bas khali phone karte hain main abhi keyword change karti hu, ye karti hu, woh karti hu aisa bol ke baad mein same hai aur usme ek do ghanta hamara le lenge. Same issue hai baki kuch bhi nahi hai. Aaj tak IndiaMART se mujhe ek bhi lead convert nahi hua hai sales mein.
Executive: To dekhiye ek cheez main aapko batati hu. Aapne jo abhi issue bataya ki inquiry aise hi aati hai. Sir dekhiye sabse pehle to catalog aapka koi bhi buyer dekh sakta hai. Theek hai? To wahin se inquiry post karte hain, wahin se buyer post aapke paas aata hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Add karu. Hamare paas filters ke options available hain. Aap jis product mein deal karenge sir, buyleads ke filter lagayenge to wahan pe available buyleads dikhenge aapko. Yahan pe polyester tyre cord fabric ki aayi hai.
Customer: Madam ji, maine sab cheeze karke dekhi hai madam ji. Iske liye main abhi IndiaMART ki team ka call uthane mein bhi takleef ho raha hai. Kyunki ek cheeze baar baar hone ke baad uske upar workout ho nahi raha hai. Yadi mera customer mujhe kuch cheeze mangta hai na to I will understand karke usko resolve karta hu. Ek solution dene ke baad bhi same issue wohi hai. Maan lo ki mujhe maine din bhar mein do teen char part abhi mera buyleads jo hai na ye pura aapke system mein dikhega. Aap karo ek ek call sabko. Unko pucho jis jiske regarding unhone buyleads diya hai us product ka naam bol ke unko bolo ki aapko ye chahiye kya. Isse bolega yaar nahi, wrong number, hume chahiye nahi, ye kya hota hai.
Executive: Sir lekin ek cheez dekhiye, main aapko ek baat batati hu sir. Buyleads jo hain aap consume to proper kar rahe hain. Jitni buyleads aa rahi hain woh aap sari check kar rahe hain. Inquiry ke numbers bhi aapke better hain. Buyer calls bhi aap answer kar hi le rahe hain. Thodi bahut calls aapki miss ho rahi hain. To sir aisa to nahi hai ki buyer ko Trust issues aa rahe hain. Kyunki dekhiye buyleads to aapke product ke according aa rahi hain sir.
Customer: Pallevi ji, can you hear me? Mujhe kya bolna hai aapko samajh mein aayi hi nahi. Main kya bol raha hu? Main aapka point samajh rahi hu sir. Customer ko samajh mein aa raha hai, nahi samajh mein aa raha hai isse kya matlab hai? Agar customer seedha bol deta hai mujhe ki ye meri mera requirement hai hi nahi. Aapko samajh mein aaya kya madam ji ki mera kehne ka pain kya hai? Aap samajh nahi pa rahe.
Executive: Main samajh gayi hu. Ji. Sir main aapka point. Main call uthau ya na uthau usse kya matlab hai? Jo mere paas lead aati hai main consume kar leta hu. To usko call back main kar leta hu immediately. Agar mera backend team karti hai. Uske upar remark seedha aata hai ki hamara humko product ye chahiye nahi hai. Ye kya hai? Wrong number hai, galat hai. Ye sab cheeze aise hi message aata hai. Ye mera galti hai.
Executive: Sir, main please puch rahi hu. Ye issue aapko buyleads mein aa raha hai ya phir inquiries mein buyer calls mein aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi, buyleads mein aa raha hai. Inquiry mein agar customer karega to theek hai.
Executive: Sir, aap ek kaam ye kar sakte hain. Aap ye kariega abhi recent mein aapne jo bhi buyleads purchase ki hai ya phir aap jo bhi buyleads purchase karenge usme jo bhi agar problem aayega aap bas mujhe itna help kar sakte hain sir jo buyleads ka jo purchase number hota hai, theek hai? Woh aap mere ko share kar sakte hain sir. Main ek baar team se check karati hu buyleads mein problem ye aa raha hai, ye issue hai.
Customer: Maine maine kal bhi aapke jo kya kya Dipansha ya kaun hai unko bhi wohi bola tha. Main ek baar call kar lijiye aap. Subah mujhe 9:00 baje call karenge, 8:00 baje call isse problem solve nahi main khud irritated ho raha hu. Ki main matlab 8:00 baje aap call karke bol rahe ho ki aap ek baar system mein check kar sakte hain kya, access de denge kya.
Executive: Nahi woh to relevant time nahi hai sir bilkul. Woh galat time hai.
Customer: Aur definitely madam, I am dekho main agar CEO hu main jaunga to subah se continuously meetings hai aur usme aapka lagatar phone chalu rehta hai. Aur basically kya hai ki mujhe mujhe itna pata hai ki jab tak main nahi bolunga tab tak uske upar workout kaise hoga ya sudhar kaise hoga. Ye mujhe bhi pata hai lekin paanch che baar ho gaya mam kitne jab mera account khula hai aap dekh lijiye. Har mahine do teen baar call aate hain har aapka jo access leta hai ye sab cheeze karta hai aadha aadha ghanta hum spend karke baith chuke hain. Kuch fayda hota nahi hai na. Main ye kya bol raha hu ki agar iska ratio mam 70 30 chhodo 90 10 aisa na aisa to main kabhi bhi ye review nahi dalta tha. Ek bhi lead jo hai na buylead woh na convert ho chuki hai aur na hi koi kisi ne sales mein phone kiya hai ya ye sab cheeze. Agar abhi aap bolte hain ki keyword se keyword mam agar maan lijiye TV ko TV hi bolenge na fridge thodi bolenge. Technical word jo hai na wohi hum humne dalna hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur basically maine bahut sare sudhar jo aapki team ne bataya na chalo koi baat nahi ye bhi karke dekhiye sab cheeze karke dekh liye mam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aisa hai abhi dekho ye humne abhi soch rahe the ye khatam ho jayega na to apna ye jo aapka Alibaba ka hai na woh kya hai unka?
Executive: Sir, ek chota sa issue main bhi notice yahan pe kar rahi hu. Aapko abhi aapse baat karte karte maine aapka buyleads ka pura purchasing pattern check kiya hai. Dekhiye sir thodi bahut buyleads main aapko batana chahungi dekhiye jahan pe aapke side se thodi si galti ho rahi hai sir woh mera kaam hai correct karna. Buyleads jo purchase ho rahi hai na sir woh thodi si purani buyleads purchase ho rahi hain. Main agar 12 November ki baat karu 12 November ko jo buyleads aapne purchase ki thi.
Customer: Aap aap aapki baat barabar hai madam. Dekhiye.
Executive: Aap ye cheeze correct kar sakte hain sir na to thoda sa improvement bilkul dikhega.
Customer: Woh bhi theek hai. Maan lo jis time buylead ho gayi generate ho gayi within the second hum usko pakad liye woh bhi karke dekh liye mam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Woh bhi karke dekho matlab mujhe nahi lagta ki ye issue hai. Theek hai maan lijiye buylead agar mera late maine purchase kar liya to customer ne mujhe bolna chahiye phone karne ke baad ki sir already we consume from another sources. Okay? No problem.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye already maine mera requirement fulfill ho gaya. Barabar ye to hona chahiye na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Agar maan lo ki aapka kehna hai ki 10 din teen din char din purani aap buylead consume karte ho.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To jab customer ko call to karna hi padega na buylead agar humne bas purchase kar liya to hum call bhi karte hain na unka jo response aata hai na madam woh bahut alag hai kyunki woh ye cheez kya hai woh humko hi puchta hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ye aapki taraf se ye verified.
Executive: Aap ek kaam aap ye karna sir. Aap ek kaam ye kariega aap apne ye sab cheeze pehle kar lijiye ki verified dekh liya, genuine buyer sab cheeze unke contact aate hain.
Customer: Nahi sir main aapko kuch different cheez bol rahi hu. Aap suniyega meri baat sir. Aap na abhi jo bhi buyleads purchase karenge, theek hai? Agar us buylead mein ya phir purani koi buylead agar aapke paas hai to agar aap mere ko purchase number de sakte hain, lead number de sakte hain, theek hai sir? Ek baar woh share zarur kariye. Do teen buyleads mere ko aap bhejiye ya phir Akanksha ka number agar aapke paas hai unko aap details dijiye. Main ek baar check karwati hu team se.
Customer: Nahi nahi theek hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai mam. I am totally agree with you. Ye bhi karke dekh lijiye dekh lete hain aap mujhe khali WhatsApp number aapka share kar lijiye uspe message kar lijiye. Jaise buyleads consume hoti hai till today main immediately unko call karne ke baad verify hone ke baad aapko share kar leta hu. Theek hai na?
Executive: Aap mere ko bas ek baar bata dijiyega ki ye issue aa raha hai is buylead mein same problem hai ya bataiyega.
Customer: Main main ye discuss kar lunga buylead jo aati hai unko main seedha call kar lunga personally. Yadi isme kuch mujhe miscommunication dikhta hai ya kya hota hai differences same buylead ka number aapko share kar deta hu.
Executive: Theek hai sir bilkul ye aap itna sa kariega mere liye. Main ek baar buylead team se check karaungi. Baki sir aapke paas mera number aa jayega kuch bhi issues hote hain na mere se ek baar connect kariye. Agar Akanksha se aapko lag raha hai proper resolution nahi mil raha hai aap mere se ek baar connect kariye. Main unki senior baat kar rahi hu sir. Unke manager baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Nahi mera concern aisa nahi Akanksha ji ya mera kuch aisa nahi hai. Basically kya hai mam ki jo platform maine business lene ke liye kuch hope se liya tha usme ho nahi raha to aadmi irritated ho jata hai aur isme kitna baar workout work karna hai. Mahine mein do do baar work karne ke baad bhi uska matlab ye value for money hai nahi woh cheeze pata nahi. Mujhe ek bhi lead aa gayi na mam chalo koi baat nahi. I am happy, no problem.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aisa hai.
Executive: Nahi sir ise solve karke dete hain buylead mein jo issues aa rahe hain na ise ek baar solve karke dete hain. Baki main abhi catalog aapka khol rahi hu sir. Yahan pe abhi mujhe kuch fresh buyleads dikh rahi hain jaise polyester tyre cord fabric ki hai aur emerald yarn waste ki hai. Ye buyleads sir fresh hai abhi recently aayi hain ek baar aap check zarur kariye inhe. Sir aapki koi specific location bhi hai ya phir pan India mein aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Nahi pan India mam main kya pan India mein aapki dealing to ye jo buyleads aa rahi hain sir ye.
Executive: Pan India mein aapki dealing to ye jo buyleads aa rahi hain sir ye.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap IndiaMART ke review acche nahi hai baki ke log hum jo jis business isme baithte hain uske liye maine bahut din mana kiya tha but aapke jo sales executive the unhone woh package haath mein jama ke nikal gaye woh. Humko ye sab cheeze pata tha ki jo buyers nahi hai na koi woh bhi call kar lete hain aisa.
Executive: Sir woh to dekhiye aapko wohi hai ki catalog ke through to koi bhi call kar sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir main aapki baat sahi hai sahi hai madam lekin din mein mujhe agar maan lo 50 call aane chahiye aane dijiye koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kaam ke aaye to that is okay na. 50 mein se ek bhi call agar kaam ka nahi nahi aa raha hai main call kar raha hu to usme aadmi irritated ho aur ye ek mahine ka nahi hai mam since purchase jo hamare itne salon ka jo business hai na wohi hamare buyers consume humko ja raha hai na offline business ho raha hai accha. IndiaMART ke chakkar mein sabka dukaan band karna padta hai.
Executive: Sorry sir ise sort karte hain thoda sa aap buyleads ke mere ko link bhej dijiyega main ek baar usse check karwati hu team se, theek hai? Dusra sir buyleads koshish kariye fresh purchase karein baki main aapse na next week ek baar phir se connect karungi ye check karne ke liye ki kuch improvement isme hua ya phir issues abhi same hain. Theek hai sir? Baki aap mera number save kar lijiyega.
Customer: Nahi I am right now driving you can put up message on WhatsApp.
Executive: Haan done sir. I will share a text message. Done sir. And sir one more thing aapne ek feedback share kiya tha wahin aapne dissatisfied ka feedback diya tha. Concern raise ho gaya tha sir.
Customer: Definitely I never close the.
Executive: I know I know sir just because of buyleads you are not satisfied. We will try our best to resolve this issue and for this sir you need to provide me few details where buyer where you are facing issues within buyleads. So do share this link and I will try to resolve it on priority basis. Okay sir? And also I am going to share my contact number.
Customer: After my resolution I definitely revoke my concern. Okay?
Executive: Sure sir. So as of now sir I am just closing this concern.
Customer: No no why you are closing? If you want.
Executive: Nahi nahi jo feedback ke liye aaya hai sir jo feedback aaya hai aapka main number share karungi.
Customer: Aap dal dijiye na customer is not happy still his ticket is open. We are working on the same.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai na agar aap buyleads kar rahe ho.
Executive: Sir sir main ek kaam karti hu no issues. Main ek kaam karti hu pehle aap buyleads ke link mere ko share kariye ek baar usse pura buyleads ka team se mere ko feedback aayega main phir uske baad hi aapka concern ko karungi no problem. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Feels harassed by irrelevant calls.

- No leads converted into sales.

- Executives only call to change keywords.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive explained catalog visibility to all buyers.

- Executive suggested using filters for relevant buyleads.

- Executive offered to check purchase numbers for buyleads.

- Executive shared WhatsApp number for sharing details.

- Executive assured resolution on priority basis.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share buylead purchase numbers.

- Executive will check with the buylead team.

- Executive will connect next week for updates.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer service, catalog, relevancy
